Dear Dr. Skornia:
At the last meeting of the Board of Directors of DAVI
they voted a commendation to the AVCR Board for their
outstanding contributions to the organization and the
teachers of America, It is my pleasure to pass along
to you this commendation, and to add my own deep and
sincere thanks. It is only through cooperative effort
and the time that you have so nobly given that our
organization has been able to make such rapid and
successful progress in the direction of improving inÂ¬
struction and communication of ideas in the schools of
America.
President
FLORENCE IH-CHI FAN
Administrative Assistant
MARY C. WELCH
Administrative Assistant
RECEIVED
